Message: Hi there! How can I assist you today?
I was trying to install my pixel yesterdday. but I click on refresh by accident. I try the test for more than twice but it only find the base. what can I do?

I understand that you're having trouble with your pixel installation. Could you please let me know which platform you are using to install the pixel? For example, are you using Shopify, GTM, or another platform? This will help me provide more specific instructions.

Got it! Here are the steps to install the NewsBreak Pixel on your Shopify store:
1. Log into your NewsBreak account and navigate to Tools > Ad Manager > Event Management.
2. Choose Pixel as your tracking type, Shopify as the integration method, and specify your event type. You can also turn on Event value if you have a value associated with this event.
3. The code and instructions will be generated after you fill in all required fields.
4. Locate your base code in Step 1 and copy that code.
5. Go to your Shopify admin panel, navigate to Online Store > Themes > Actions > Edit Code.
6. Find the theme.liquid file under Layout and paste the base code just above the `</head>` tag.
7. Save the changes and test again.
If you need more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify).
If you still encounter issues, feel free to reach out for further assistance!
can you check my accoutn to see if it is ok. I have done this yesterday

I'm unable to directly check your account, but I can guide you on what to do next. Please email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with the details of your issue. Make sure to include any relevant information such as your account ID and a description of the steps you've taken so far. They will be able to assist you further and check your account for any issues.
